info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 3:31AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND... HAZARDS...A lake effect snow band which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 329 AM EST, a lake effect snow band was near Gloversville moving southeast at 25 MPH into southern Saratoga and Rensselaer County. THIS LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND WILL BE NEAR... Johnstown around 335 AM EST. Gloversville and Fonda around 340 AM EST. Broadalbin, Fort Johnson and Tribes Hill around 350 AM EST. Amsterdam and Hagaman around 400 AM EST. Glenville, Pattersonville-Rotterdam Junction, Rotterdam Junction and Burnt Hills around 415 AM EST. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 26 and 28. Interstate 890 between exits 1a and 7. Interstate 87 between exits 5 and 7, and between exits 8A and 10. Interstate 787 between exits 8 and 9. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
